remarks:
Virtual deduction proof of ~ bitr3 . The following user's proof is completed by invoking mmj2's unify command and using mmj2's StepSelector to pick all remaining steps of the Metamath proof.
1:: ` |- (. ( ph <-> ps ) ->. ( ph ` ` <-> ps ) ). `
2:1,?: ~ e1a ` |- (. ( ph <-> ps ) ->. ( ps ` ` <-> ph ) ). `
3:: ` |- (. ( ph <-> ps ) ,. ( ph <-> ch ) ` ` ->. ( ph <-> ch ) ). `
4:3,?: ~ e2 ` |- (. ( ph <-> ps ) ,. ( ph <-> ch ) ` ` ->. ( ch <-> ph ) ). `
5:2,4,?: ~ e12 ` |- (. ( ph <-> ps ) ,. ( ph <-> ch ) ` ` ->. ( ps <-> ch ) ). `
6:5: ` |- (. ( ph <-> ps ) ->. ( ( ph ` ` <-> ch ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) ). `
qed:6: ` |- ( ( ph <-> ps ) -> ( ( ph <-> ch ) ` ` -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) ) `
(Contributed by Alan Sare, 31-Dec-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
